name: FUGAZI
description:
“Nobody knows if a stock is going to go up, down, sideways or in fucking circles, least of all crypto traders, right? It's all a fugazi, you know what a fugazi is?” “Fugazi. It's fake.”
- The Wolf of Wall Street

This token was launched by Randy Hilarski purely to bind to other tokens he feels will do well on Pulsechain. Bonded liquidity is the future of crypto. Fugazi is putting Heart's Law to a test.
